reg:regulation.reg:title:
Property Transfer Tax
Exemption Regulation No. 5

bcl:section.bcl:text: For the purpose of implementing Replotting Scheme No. 101 of the Corporation of the District of North Vancouver

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: the transfers of land legally described under the heading "Existing Parcels" in the attached Schedule from the owners of the land to the corporation of the District of North Vancouver, and
the transfers of land legally described under the heading "New Parcels" in the attached Schedule from the Corporation of the District of North Vancouver to the owners of the land

bcl:section.bcl:text: are taxable transactions exempted under the Property Transfer Tax Act from tax.

reg:content.reg:regnote: [Note: The Schedule is exempt from publication and may be inspected at the offices of the Corporation of the District of North Vancouver, District Municipal Hall, 355 West Queens Road, North Vancouver, B.C., V7L 4K1.]
reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions of the Property Transfer Tax Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 378, relevant to the enactment of this regulation: section 37 (2) (b)]
